#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, M, N, i, j;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d", &M, &N );
		if( ( M == 0 ) && ( N == 0 ) )
			printf("0\n");			
		else {

			i = M / 2;
			j = N / 2;
			printf("%d\n", ( max( N - 1 - j, j ) + max( M - 1 - i, i ) + 1 ) ); 		
		}
	}
	
	return 0;	
}
